text.name: AGROSPONSOR_SP1
text.text: In partnership with /NAME and other companies. /LF The AgroSponsor offers you a sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools!/LF We hope your success with the AgroSponsor and Partners!

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_SP2
text.text: In exclusive partnership with /NAME. /LF The AgroSponsor gives you a sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools!

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_SP3
text.text: /NAME offers you an exclusive sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools! /LF We hope your success with the AgroSponsor and Partners!

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_HELPR
text.text: Top prize that you can compete every day.

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_HELPDSP
text.text: Daily sponsorship amount you will receive every day.

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_YESNODSP
text.text: You want this to be your sponsor?

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_YESNODSPTXT
text.text: Are you sure you want to select %s as your sponsor?
